feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud - API Availability for BP Extension Fields Read, AR Payment Block Update, and P
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are investigating API availability in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition for the following three scenarios. Please answer with the specific API name if available, or clearly state if no API exists (and any alternative approaches if not possible).

Question 1: Business Partner Master Read (including Extension Fields)
・Can we retrieve BP master data including extension field values via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.


Question 2: AR Open Item - Payment Block Flag Update
・Can we toggle (set/unset) the payment block flag on AR line items via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.

Question 3: Payment Advice Document Registration
・Can we register payment advice documents via API?
・If yes, please provide the specific API name.
・If no, please confirm that no standard API supports this and suggest any alternative approaches.

Note: We would appreciate responses in the same numbered order (1→2→3) to keep the discussion clear.
Thank you in advance!

entry.title: Output Management - How to send emails to mail-addresses from BUR001 relationship
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

in our scenario we have integrated S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition with Sales Cloud V2. As stated in that KBA, V2 is not able to display the email-address of the business partner in the UI. To see and use the email addresses in V2, they have to be replicated via the relationships. Therefore we would have to maintain it on relationship-level in S/4.

The challenge we're facing is: In S/4 we need the email address on Business Partner level for the use in Output Management (we're using Y partner functions to send emails to the Contact Persons). 

To summarize: In V2 we need the mail addresses in another place than in S/4...

Has anyone an idea, if we could use a CDS-View in S/4 to use the mail-address from the relationship in Output Management? I know there's a BAdI APOC_ADD_EMAIL_RECIPIENTS which might help.

BR Tobi

entry.title: Customize emails for e-invoices sent via DRC Cloud Edition
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

we have integrated SAP DRC Cloud Edition with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

We want to send out e-invoices (ZUGFeRD) via email. The scenario works and the invoice is sent out.

But we would like to customize the email (subject, body) that is sent out (like we could do for other invoices that are sent out via Output Management directly from Public Cloud).

Does anybody know if that is even possible and if so, how?

BR Tobi

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud- data volume / enterprise Project WBS
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud with enterprise projects (WBS and WBS elements)

I am looking for feedback regarding data volume (for example, a minimum of 200,000 WBS elements).

More specifically, I would like to hear your experience on:

  • Large volumes of Project master data during migration (using the Migration Cockpit)

  • Impact on Finance closing activities involving project data: performance of settlement runs, distributions, or allocations with high volumes

  • General volumetry issues related to financial projects

Thank you in advance for your feedback!

Malorie

entry.title: APP "Manage Profit Center Groups" cannot be found in Test System
entry.content:
Hi Experts, We cannot found APP "manage profit center groups" in Test System. We checked the authorization, we have the business role "SAP_BR_DIVISION_ACCOUNTANT". Could you suggest how to investigate this problem? Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud如何实现使用文档凭证功能，同时将制造图纸等文件保留在本地
entry.content:
咨询大家有熟悉ECC DMS的顾问么？

中国客户的德国子公司在实施从ECC切换到S4 Public Cloud的项目。

德国子公司用户的现有制造图纸等文件 通过文档凭证存在ECC里，但原始文件还是在本地服务器上。 文档凭证是挂图纸文件的凭证，可以做文件版本管理（ECC DMS）。

如果从ECC切换到S4 Public Cloud，德国子公司用户希望文件不上传到S4 Public Cloud，只创建文档凭证，文件放在德国本地。S4 Public Cloud有对应的实现方案吗？

德国用户得知如果使用S4 Public Cloud，需要把文件传到S4 Public Cloud，担心安全问题，不愿意传，但又要使用文档凭证功能。希望和SAP熟悉DMS的专家有机会沟通。非常感谢。

entry.title: How to maintain documentation for data elements on Cloud ERP / Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi community,

am I right that there is currently no option to maintain the documentation of a data element (a custom data element) on public cloud?

I mean the long text description/documentation where you can describe the usage of a data element in a long text format.

The reason why I would like to use that, is that I think if I could maintain that documentation, that the help content would be displayed accordingly in custom build Fiori Elements applications. Like it is done for standard data elements which have a documentation. I'm talking about the function on the Public Cloud launchpad when you press F1 in an application or on the question mark button on the top right. SAP Companion which is part of SAP Enable Now. I know that this product will be replaced with SAP WalkMe. But anyway, it would be great to have an option to maintain the long text documentation of custom data elements.

Even if the maintenance of such would be cumbersome (e.g. only creatable by creating a custom class which is creating the text - like it used to be for object like Application Job Catalog entries, before SAP provided UIs for this in Eclipse ADT), I would just love to be able to provide more information on a data element being used in SAP Companion automatically.

Any information on this would be very helpful.

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition – “Small WM”: scope item, licensing, IM → WM switch
entry.content:
We are currently facing conflicting statements regarding warehouse management in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and are looking for a clear clarification from the community.

Context

  • It is stated by some that a so-called “small Warehouse Management” is always included as standard in the Public Cloud.

  • Other statements indicate that a dedicated scope item and potentially additional licensing are required.

  • Our requirement is very limited and specific:
    We mainly need WM for organizational structure purposes, i.e. to create WM warehouses (warehouse numbers) – not for complex warehouse processes or decentralized EWM.

Specific questions

  1. Which exact scope item in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition represents this “small WM”?
    (Scope ID / official name in CBC)

  2. Is this scope always included in the standard Public Cloud license, or is it separately licensable?

  3. Does this scope allow real WM warehouses in the organizational structure, or is it effectively only Inventory Management with extended features?

  4. Is there any official SAP documentation or community statement that clearly confirms the scope and licensing situation?

  5. Future IM → WM scenario:

    • Are there known restrictions for serial-number–managed materials?

    • Are serial number profiles in IM and WM incompatible, making a later switch complex or risky?

entry.title: Hi Experts,I need your guidance. We are working in SAP Public Cloud and this is related to MM
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
I need your guidance. We are working in SAP Public Cloud and our full production process has not yet been implemented. I want to update SFG stock at each production stage, showing the transfer from one material to another along with the quantity and any process loss.

I initially considered using a material-to-material transfer (309 movement). However, the challenge is that I need system-generated batches for both Material A and Material B during the 309 movement, because the batch classification characteristics (size, grade, tolerance, etc.) differ between input and output materials.

Is there any alternative way to manage stage-wise inventory updates besides using 309 movement? until our production process is fully implemented.
Thanks in advance for your valuable inputs.

entry.title: MODIFY ENTITY FOR CREATE I_SALESORDERTP throws dump in batch job
entry.content: We have created custom class in ADT to create manufacturing sales order through EML statement and it successfully creates sales order when I execute the class through ABAP application console. But if the same class is scheduled as job through job template it throws runtime error RAISE_SHORTDUMP in program CX_SADL_SHORTDUMP stating reason Content ID reference 'H001' misses preceding content ID. Please note that the job was successful for MODIFY entities with single value but throws this dump for Modify entities with table as we have to create sales order with multiple lines. Could you please provide suggestions to resolve this issue

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud Transportation Management
entry.content:
Hi all — I understand that SAP Public Cloud TM doesn’t support third-party sales order processing scope items. I’m trying to find a workaround and attempted to create a freight document via the inbound delivery linked to the 3rd party purchase order. However, the system is not generating the freight document.

 

Has anyone encountered this scenario before? If so, please share your insights.

entry.title: How do I change the item type text?
entry.content:
Dear experts,
I would like to change the text of the standard item type provided in the public cloud. Is this possible? If so, where can I change it?
SSCUI:103539 was grayed out even when I pressed "Edit" and could not be changed.

entry.title: Custom verification logic for RF transaction in Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are on Public Cloud WM and use RF devices in our warehouse for Inbound / Replenishment process,

One of the requirement is to verify the product using the supplier's barcode printed on the box.

However this barcode is a combination of supplier code + product number + qty (separated by a unique separator) concatenated.

Is there any option / mechanism in Public Cloud WM by which we can decode the product number upon verification of the barcode on the RF device against Product verification field?

Your ideas will be much appreciated.

Regards,

Shashi

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud Custom RF verification
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Please suggest if it is possible to add a custom verification logic for one of the fields on RF(example : product - decode product number from a suppliers barcode - barcode consists of other fields as well, not just product).

Regards,

Shashi

entry.title: Unable to Use ZCDS or Any Standard CDS View in AMDP Table Function
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud  and trying to consume a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function.

However, I am getting the following error during activation: Please see the below Screenshots.

The object DDLS I_PRODUCTIONORDEROPCOMPONENTTP must not be used here, because it is not released for usage in AMDP methods.

Questions:

  1. How can we use a CDS View in an AMDP Table Function in Public Cloud?

  2. How can we release objects from C1 to C4?

  3. Is there any workaround, as this is urgent?

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud – Dunning Notice Email to Customer + Multiple Contact Persons from BP
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL) and are trying to configure Dunning Notice emails so that email IDs are picked dynamically from BP master data, without hardcoding email addresses.

Requirement

When a dunning run is executed:

Email should be sent to the Customer BP email

Email should also be sent to all linked Contact Persons’ email IDs

Multiple Contact Persons should receive the email automatically

All email IDs must be derived only from BP master (Customer + Contact Person)

What we have already configured

  1. BP Master

Customer BP has email maintained in Address → Communication

Contact Person BPs have email maintained

Relationships maintained: Has Contact Person, Has Dunning Recipient

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Receiver

Application: Dunning

Determination Step: Receiver

Decision Table: DT_RECEIVER

Entry maintained:

Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE

Account Type = D (Customer) Role = D Exclusive Indicator = false

Note: We do not see CP (Contact Person) as a selectable Role in Receiver.

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Email Recipient

Determination Step: Email Recipient

Decision Table: DT_EMAIL_RECEIVER

Entries maintained:

Row 1: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE,  Email Type = TO, Email Address = Context → Customer → Email Address

Row 2: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE, Email Type = TO Email Address = Context → Contact Person → Email Address

 

Issue / Clarification Required

CP (Contact Person) does not appear as a Role in Receiver determination

It is unclear whether Contact Persons are implicitly derived during Email Recipient determination

Despite maintaining BP relationships and Email Recipient context mapping, the behavior is not clearly documented

Questions

  1. In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it standard behavior that Contact Persons are not selectable in the Receiver Role?
  2. Is the above configuration sufficient for sending dunning emails to:
    1. Customer BP email, and
    2. All Contact Person emails marked as Dunning Recipient?
  3. Is there any additional configuration or prerequisite required for Contact Person email determination?
  4. Is there any SAP documentation or note confirming this behavior?

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud – Dunning Notice Email to Customer + Multiple Contact Persons from BP Maste
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3SL) and are trying to configure Dunning Notice emails so that email IDs are picked dynamically from BP master data, without hardcoding email addresses.

Requirement

When a dunning run is executed:

Email should be sent to the Customer BP email

Email should also be sent to all linked Contact Persons’ email IDs

Multiple Contact Persons should receive the email automatically

All email IDs must be derived only from BP master (Customer + Contact Person)

What we have already configured

  1. BP Master

Customer BP has email maintained in Address → Communication

Contact Person BPs have email maintained

Relationships maintained: Has Contact Person, Has Dunning Recipient

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Receiver

Application: Dunning

Determination Step: Receiver

Decision Table: DT_RECEIVER

Entry maintained:

Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE

Account Type = D (Customer) Role = D Exclusive Indicator = false

Note: We do not see CP (Contact Person) as a selectable Role in Receiver.

  1. Output Parameter Determination – Email Recipient

Determination Step: Email Recipient

Decision Table: DT_EMAIL_RECEIVER

Entries maintained:

Row 1: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE,  Email Type = TO, Email Address = Context → Customer → Email Address

Row 2: Output Type = DUNN_NOTICE, Email Type = TO Email Address = Context → Contact Person → Email Address

 

Issue / Clarification Required

CP (Contact Person) does not appear as a Role in Receiver determination

It is unclear whether Contact Persons are implicitly derived during Email Recipient determination

Despite maintaining BP relationships and Email Recipient context mapping, the behavior is not clearly documented

Questions

  1. In SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud, is it standard behavior that Contact Persons are not selectable in the Receiver Role?
  2. Is the above configuration sufficient for sending dunning emails to:
    1. Customer BP email, and
    2. All Contact Person emails marked as Dunning Recipient?
  3. Is there any additional configuration or prerequisite required for Contact Person email determination?
  4. Is there any SAP documentation or note confirming this behavior?

entry.title: Regarding to method of add items to Search Helps.
entry.content:
Dear  All.

I want to add Items to Search Help.

For examples, Search Term2, custom fields, etc.

So, please let me know how to add items to Search Helps.

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Mass Maintenance of Tax classification
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i have the following issue. During the migration of customers, the information for the tax classification was filled incorrectly into the migration template and migrated with the migration cockpit
All entries consist of a country code, the tax category (mainly TTX1) and the tax classification (1 or 0). 
Because of an human error, many entries have a variety of country codes, when they all should only have one specific country code.
As a result none of these entries are displayed in the app "manage business partner master data" under the sales area section.

If i manually edit those business partners, i can add an entry with the correct country code, that overwrites the wrong entry that is not visible.
So far i have looked into the mass maintenance tool, but there i can only change the tax classification to a different value, but not the country code, which is the incorrect entry.
I also looked into the app "mass import of business partner master data", but there i get a message that the fields i want to import (correct) are alread filled.

The table that contains this data is called "KNVI".

My question is, is there way to do this correction in mass ? Can i update these entries with the migration cockpit or did i miss another option ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Warehouse Physical Inventory document creation, unable to change data in field.
entry.content:
Hi SAP team,

We are trying to create physical inventory document in warehouse management using the app Create Inventory Documents - Physical Inventory (SCWM/PI_DOC_CREATE). Here by default the blocking indicator is marked as X i.e. has been enabled and is unable to edit it. likewise the freeze inventory indicator is also not changeable. is it a standard system behavior or is there any settings or configurations missing from our side? please guide. 

Best Regards,
